title: China-UK Partnership to Develop Biotechnology Applications of Novel Heparinoids and Sulfated Polysaccharides
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Grant just started in 2013, website and network being developed  Economic
findingsText: Grant just started in 2013, website and network being developed Still under development Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
